title: Marine faces federal charges in firebombing of Planned Parenthood clinic
description: Two men, including an active duty Marine, face federal charges in connection with the firebombing of a Planned Parenthood clinic in California last year, the DOJ said.

title: Trump narrowing list of potential attorneys to join his legal team: Sources
description: Former President Trump is narrowing down his list of potential attorneys as he and his team work to expand his legal team following his arraignment Tuesday, sources say.

title: Remains found stuffed in garment bag 45 years ago in rural Nevada ID'd as Ohio woman
description: Nevada State Police say recent DNA testing has enabled the identification of human remains found 45 years ago inside a garment bag in a small town two hours northeast of Reno

title: Grand jury indicts Daniel Penny in chokehold death of Jordan Neely
description: A grand jury has decided to indict Daniel Penny in the chokehold death of Jordan Neely on the New York City subway.

title: Officer accused of shooting 11-year-old 'absolutely sorry,' lawyer says
description: The attorney for Greg Capers, the Mississippi police officer suspended for shooting and injuring 11-year-old Aderrien Murry, says the  incident was unintentional.

title: Parents of girl who drowned at water park file lawsuit
description: The parents of a 6-year-old girl who drowned at a Kansas City water park allege in a lawsuit that the park hires young, inexperienced life guards and fails to adequately train them

title: Harvard Medical School morgue manager indicted in theft, sale of human remains
description: A manager at the Harvard Medical School morgue, his wife and three other people have been indicted in connection with the theft and sale of human body parts

title: Captured Ukrainian soldiers face trial in Russia
description: More than 20 Ukrainian soldiers who were taken prisoner during fighting in Ukraine are facing trial in southern Russia

title: European Parliament ready to pass landmark AI legislation
description: The landmark legislation aims to promote "human-centric and trustworthy AI."

title: Attorney General Garland speaks on Trump case, defends special counsel
description: He made his first comments since the former president was indicted.

title: Bud Light, top US seller since 2001, loses sales crown to Modelo
description: After more than two decades as America’s best-selling beer, Bud Light has slipped into second place

title: Driver whose car vaulted over tow truck says: 'I thought I was going to die'
description: A woman whose car was captured on video vaulting into the air over a tow truck on a Georgia highway says she's recovering after two weeks in the hospital and several surgeries

title: Report: 2020 US census helped guide distribution of $2.8 trillion
description: The head count of every U.S. resident in 2020 helped guide the distribution of $2.8 trillion in annual federal spending, underscoring the importance of participating in the once-a-decade census

title: Texas court allows AG Ken Paxton's securities fraud trial to move to Houston
description: A Texas court has ruled that embattled Attorney General Ken Paxton’s long-delayed trial on securities fraud charges from 2015 will take place in Houston

title: UN: Sudan’s war displaces over 2 million
description: The U.N. migration agency says Sudan’s conflict has displaced more than 2 million people as the tally of civilians killed in the raging fighting climbed to at least 959 dead

title: WATCH:  German zoo welcomes newborn elephant calf
description: A herd of elephants at a zoo in Germany protectively shields its most recent addition — a newborn elephant calf.

title: Woman comes forward to accuse lawyer of 2007 rape in Boston
description: A woman who’s accused a New Jersey man of raping her 16 years ago in Boston says she felt that her freedom had been taken away from her that night, and she wants to face him in court

title: Federal Reserve expected to pause monthslong string of interest rate hikes
description: The decision arrives a day after fresh inflation data exceeded expectations.

title: Boat carrying wedding guests capsizes, killing at least 103
description: More than 100 people died after a boat carrying wedding guests capsized in Nigeria on Monday, authorities said.

title: What GOP candidates have said about promising to pardon Trump in classified docs case
description: Some Republican candidates are promising to pardon Trump if elected; he separately also faces felony state charges in New York

title: Russian court sends an associate of Kremlin foe Navalny to prison for 7 1/2 years
description: A court in Russia has convicted an associate of imprisoned opposition leader Alexei Navalny on extremism charges and sentenced her to 7 1/2 years in prison, the latest step in a yearslong crackdown by the Kremlin on opposition activists

title: China inks 'strategic partnership' with Palestinan Authority as it expands Middle East presence
description: China says it's established a “strategic partnership” with the Palestinian Authority during a visit to the country by President Mahmoud Abbas

title: Google must break up digital ad business over competition concerns, European regulators say
description: European Union antitrust regulators are taking aim at Google’s lucrative digital advertising business, saying the tech giant must sell off some of its ad business to address competition concerns

title: Pope expected to be released soon from hospital after abdominal surgery: Vatican
description: The Vatican spokesman says Pope Francis is expected to be released from the hospital “in the coming days.”

title: WATCH:  Dogs have fun in snow and sand
description: Bill the poodle chased his owner down a ski slope in Lake Tahoe while Kiki the basset hound hung onto her owner’s jeans to get a free ride through the sand.

title: UK police hunt motive in Nottingham attack as friends mourn student athlete victims
description: Police in England are working to piece together details of a knife and van attack that killed two 19-year-old students and another man in the city of Nottingham

title: WATCH:  Killer whale rips rudder off boat
description: It is the latest in a series of orca attacks on boats.

title: Police K-9 dies from heat exhaustion as cop car malfunctions, unexpectedly shuts off
description: A 4-year-old police K-9 named Aron has died from heat exhaustion after being left in a patrol car that unexpectedly shut off when the officer was away from the vehicle.

title: Rescue underway after boat carrying migrants capsizes near Greece
description: Rescue efforts are underway after a fishing vessel carrying migrants capsized in the Mediterranean Sea, about 54 miles off the coast of Greece.

title: Kayaker presumed dead after disappearing into frigid water while with fiancée
description: A man who was kayaking with his fiancée is presumed to have died after his vessel began sinking and he was submerged and he disappeared into near-freezing water.

title: 2 dead in Japan after shooting during live-fire training session
description: Two people have died from a shooting incident at a morning live-fire training session for Japanese Ground Self Defense Force recruits, local police told ABC News.

title: Vegas Golden Knights win Stanley Cup thanks to depth and consistency
description: The Vegas Golden Knights won the Stanley Cup thanks to a deep roster that could withstand injuries all season and sustain a long playoff run

title: Prosecutors accuse weapons expert in Baldwin case of drinking, smoking
description: Prosecutors are accusing the weapons supervisor on the film set where Alec Baldwin shot and killed a cinematographer of drinking and smoking marijuana in the evenings during the filming of “Rust.”

title: Mississippi police officer who shot 11-year-old boy suspended without pay
description: A Mississippi police officer who shot and wounded an unarmed 11-year-old Black boy in the child’s home has been suspended without pay

title: Asa Hutchinson wants 'more courage' in 2024 GOP field as some promise to pardon Trump
description: Former Arkansas Gov. Asa Hutchinson gave his first reaction to Trump's arraignment Tuesday in an interview with "ABC News Live Prime" anchor Linsey Davis

title: Heat wave expected to reach parts of Texas, millions at risk for severe weather
description: Severe weather is possible for 16 million Americans across the Southern U.S. from Texas to South Carolina on Tuesday.

title: Riley Keough asks court to approve settlement over mom Lisa Marie Presley's estate
description: Riley Keough filed court docs on June 12 asking a court to approve a previously announced settlement over her late mother Lisa Marie Presley's estate.
